title: BTC price recovers from $40.3K lows with Bitcoin volumes 'decimated'
description:
Bitcoin is still taking stock of the ETF launch, analysts conclude, with BTC price lacking a convincing trend.

Bitcoin (BTC) edged closer to $42,000 into the Jan. 21 weekly close with time almost up on a grim week for bulls.

Data from Cointelegraph Markets Pro and TradingView showed BTC price action stabilizing above $41,000 over the weekend. The pair had previously dipped to $40,270 on Bitstamp — its lowest since Dec. 11.

While not delivering major downside, Bitcoin offered little hope to those seeking new highs, with market participants looking ahead to the weekly close and return of Wall Street trading.

Read more

title: Is SEC’s Bitcoin ETF Green Light a Watershed Moment for Crypto Industry?
description: The SEC’s decision to approve 11 exchange-traded funds (ETFs) for bitcoin marked the culmination of months of rumours and speculation, and in the days since, the industry has been reacting to what is clearly a landmark moment for the entire crypto industry.

title: Restaurant Brands International Acquires Carrols Restaurant Group in $1 Billion Deal to Embrace AI-Powered Overhaul
description: Fast food giant Restaurant Brands International is making a significant move to revamp its restaurant operations by acquiring Carrols Restaurant Group, its largest franchisee, in a billion-dollar deal.  The acquisition is part of Restaurant Brands International’s ambitious “Reclaim the Flame” initiative, aimed at revitalizing its Burger King stores through extensive technological upgrades and operational improvements. title: Crypto Whales Taking Advantage of Bitcoin, Ethereum and Chainlink Dips, According to Lookonchain
description:
Crypto whales are buying up the correction in digital assets markets, according to blockchain tracking firm Lookonchain.
